body_html:
@zhanghang1989 Hi, zhanghang,

How could I use your function 'ModelDataParallel()'?

I have the following code:

vgg_19 = ModelDataParallel(vgg_19, device_ids=range(opt.num_gpus))
real4_feat, real5_feat = vgg_19(image)

But I got error "AttributeError: 'list' object has no attribute 'dim'". Any idea?

Thanks very much
body_text:
@zhanghang1989 Hi, zhanghang,
How could I use your function 'ModelDataParallel()'?
I have the following code:
vgg_19 = ModelDataParallel(vgg_19, device_ids=range(opt.num_gpus))
real4_feat, real5_feat = vgg_19(image)
But I got error "AttributeError: 'list' object has no attribute 'dim'". Any idea?

body:
@zhanghang1989 Hi, zhanghang,

How could I use your function 'ModelDataParallel()'?

I have the following code:
```python
vgg_19 = ModelDataParallel(vgg_19, device_ids=range(opt.num_gpus))
real4_feat, real5_feat = vgg_19(image)
```
But I got error "AttributeError: 'list' object has no attribute 'dim'". Any idea?

Thanks very much
